default.title: SaaS Bootstrap
default.description: Complete SaaS platform for business management. Manage leads, customers and more with a modern and intuitive interface.

home.title: Home
home.description: Welcome to SaaS Bootstrap. Complete platform for business management.

login.title: Login
login.description: Sign in to your account to access the admin panel.

register.title: Register
register.description: Create your account and start managing your business today.

forgot_password.title: Forgot Password
forgot_password.description: Recover access to your account by entering your email.

reset_password.title: Reset Password
reset_password.description: Set a new password for your account.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Overview of your business. Track statistics, leads and more.

leads.title: Leads
leads.description: Manage your leads efficiently. View, create and edit leads.

list.title: Leads List
list.description: View all your leads in an organized table.

create.title: Create Lead
create.description: Add a new lead to the system by filling in the information below.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account and workspace settings.

documents.title: Documents
documents.description: View and manage legal documents and contracts.
